revised_title: Investigating the Relationship between the Thymus and Testes Growth
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between the thymus and testes growth in animals, analyzing data from previous studies. The results show no significant effect of thymus removal on testes growth, and the data contrasts with the effect of castration on thymus growth. The author concludes that any effect of thymus removal on testes growth is likely small and not definitively proven.
